summary: Replaces the Poachers Axe with the Ebony War Axe mesh and textures, and still chops wood
descriptionHtml:
[center][size=5][font=Comic Sans MS][b][img]http://spacemonkeysinc.weebly.com/uploads/3/7/2/7/37272609/3555424_orig.png[/img][/b][/font][/size][/center]
[center][b][size=5][font=Comic Sans MS][i]-Presents-[/i][/font][/size][/b][/center]

[center][size=5][font=Comic Sans MS][b][i][img]http://spacemonkeysinc.weebly.com/uploads/3/7/2/7/37272609/4122175_orig.png[/img]
[/i][/b][/font][/size][b][size=5][font=Comic Sans MS][i]Weapon Replacement Mod[/i][/font][/size][/b][/center]


[center][size=5][font=Comic Sans MS][b][i]    Changes This..........[/i][/b][/font][/size][/center]
[center][b][size=5][font=Comic Sans MS][i]The Poacher's Axe[/i][/font][/size][/b][/center]




[center][size=5][font=Comic Sans MS][b][i][img]http://spacemonkeysinc.weebly.com/uploads/3/7/2/7/37272609/3799585_orig.png[/img]
[/i][/b][/font][/size][/center]
[center][b][size=5][font=Comic Sans MS][i]Into This.........[/i][/font][/size][/b][/center]
[center][b][size=5][font=Comic Sans MS][i]The Heart of the Forest[/i][/font][/size][/b][/center]


[center][size=5][font=Comic Sans MS][b][i][img]http://spacemonkeysinc.weebly.com/uploads/3/7/2/7/37272609/7756097_orig.png[/img]
[/i]
[/b][/font]
[/size][/center]
[center][size=5][font=Comic Sans MS][b][i]The Poacher's Axe is a unique wood chopping axe, one of only 2 axes that can chop wood, the other being the standard Woodcutter Axe. I have have replaced it with the Ebony War Axe texture, and changed it's name to [color=#ff3333]Heart of the Forest [/color]but it still retains [color=#ff3333]it's ability to chop wood[/color], but has the stats and damage of the Ebony War Axe. [/i]
[/b][/font]
[/size][/center]
[center][size=5][font=Comic Sans MS][b][i][color=#ff3333]This does NOT change the wood chopping animations or the regular Woodcutter Axe texture.[/color][/i]
[/b][/font]
[/size][/center]
[center][size=5][font=Comic Sans MS][b][i]I often play as a Lumber Jack or a Hunter survival woodsy type character who does NOT go hunting in dungeons or go on quests most of the time, so he does not often find or win Unique Weapons.[/i]
[/b][/font]
[/size][/center]


[center][size=5][font=Comic Sans MS][b][i]I play with Requiem and other mods that reduce carry weight and limits the amount of weapons I can carry I often have to choose carefully, most of the time I carry only a Woodcutter Axe, A Bow and Quiver and a Hunting Knife. So I made this for so when I did run into trouble I have a fighting chance. [/i]
[/b][/font]
[/size][/center]


[center][size=5][font=Comic Sans MS][b][i]The Heart of the Forest can be found in the Halted Stream Camp [/i][/b][/font][/size][/center]
[center][b][size=5][font=Comic Sans MS][i](same place as the original Poacher's Axe)[/i][/font][/size][/b][/center]


[center][size=5][font=Comic Sans MS][b][i]Here is a nice picture to help you find it [/i]
[/b][/font]
[/size][/center]
[center][size=5][font=Comic Sans MS][b][i][img]http://spacemonkeysinc.weebly.com/uploads/3/7/2/7/37272609/5912888_orig.jpg[/img]
[/i][/b][/font][/size][b][size=5][font=Comic Sans MS][i]For those who are impatient here is the item code for you to enter in the console[/i][/font][/size][/b][/center]


[center][size=5][font=Comic Sans MS][b][i]enter the ~ key to enter console and type this:    player.additem 000ae086 1  [/i]
[/b][/font]
[/size][/center]
[center][size=5][font=Comic Sans MS][b][i]then hit enter f[/i][i]or instant gratification [/i]
[/b][/font]
[/size][/center]


[center][size=5][font=Comic Sans MS][b][img]http://spacemonkeysinc.weebly.com/uploads/3/7/2/7/37272609/4983045_orig.png[/img]
[/b][/font]
[/size][/center]
[size=5][font=Comic Sans MS][b][i][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/32448/?]Dynamic Things [/url]  [/i][/b][/font][/size]
[b][size=5][font=Comic Sans MS][i]Lets you chop down trees with this axe - what more could any junior lumberjack want?[/i][/font][/size][/b]



[b][size=5][font=Comic Sans MS][i][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/56390/?]Travelers Covered Wagon [/url](shameless plug for my own mod)[/i][/font][/size][/b]
[b][size=5][font=Comic Sans MS][i]A Driveable Covered Wagon  with a built in Tent  - the first true Mobile Home in Skyrim[/i][/font][/size][/b]


[b][size=5][font=Comic Sans MS][i][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/35842/?]Skyrim Reforestation Project [/url][/i][/font][/size][/b]
[b][size=5][font=Comic Sans MS]Let's you re-plant trees you cut down [/font][/size][/b]


[b][size=5][font=Comic Sans MS][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/52635/?]LumberJacked[/url][/font][/size][/b]
[b][size=5][font=Comic Sans MS][i]Gives you XP for chopping wood and Sawing logs  [/i][/font][/size][/b]


[b][size=5][font=Comic Sans MS][i][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/36033/?]Millwater Retreat [/url][/i][/font][/size][/b]
[b][font=Comic Sans MS][size=5]Build your own Sawmill and more that PAYS you weekly[/size][/font][/b]



[center][size=5][font=Impact][youtube]5zey8567bcg[/youtube]
[/font][/size][/center]
author: Fall Hammer

files.name: Heart of the Forest - Poachers Axe Replacer
files.fileName: Heart of the Forest - Poachers Axe Replacer-56585-1-0.7z
